name: Word Star
description:
What pattern fits more words? Choose your side and find out!

Please note that all the patterns are randomly generated, and the words should all be US-English.

Game made in 3 hours for trijam-86. Version 1 was made in 3 hours, for version 2 I spent a few extra minutes to make it work in full-screen (not sure if that counts towards the timelimit, so leaving the original up just in case).
